Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute near Cicero/Rice
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Augusta, Laramie, Chicago and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/Rice.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Augusta, Laramie, Chicago and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/Rice.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
